description.en:
Yastuna volume 1 is a game compilation for the Atari Lynx.
 
There are 6 games visible from the main menu, but there are more to find during gameplay.
 
The game is available as ROM or can be downloaded to use on your flash multicart or Lynx emulator.
 
We bring a version which includes the never released Dutch version of ‘Merlain’s Quest’.
